member.name: T:Sceelix.Props.Procedures.PropCreateProcedure
member.summary: Creates Sceelix Props, i.e. entities that only exist in the Sceelix Designer to build a surrounding environment.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Props.Procedures.PropCreateProcedure.OceanPropParameter
member.summary: Creates an ocean plane at a given height, with infinite extents.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Props.Procedures.PropCreateProcedure.OceanPropParameter._output
member.summary: The ocean prop that was created.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Props.Procedures.PropCreateProcedure.FirePropParameter
member.summary: Creates an fire prop at the origin.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Props.Procedures.PropCreateProcedure.FirePropParameter._output
member.summary: The fire prop that was created.
